Header: Prime Minister worships at Devundara Raja Maha Viharaya
Content: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasingh visited Devundara Raja Maha Viharaya and Sri Vishnu Devalaya to receive blessings. Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasingh went to Devundara Raja Maha Viharaya and took part in religious activities. The Prime Minister called over on the Chief Monk of Devundara Raja Maha Viharaya The Venerable Devundara Siri Sunanda Thera and received the blessings of Maha Sangha. Thereafter he visited Sri Vishnu Devalaya to receive blessings. Ministers Mangala Samaraweera, Daya Gamage and State Minister Dilip Wedaarachchi were present on the occasion. The Prime Minister exchanged views with the people who were at the Devala premises. A portrait of Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasingh drawn by a Grade 8 student, of Matara Mahinda Rajapaksa Vidyalaya, Nipuna Kanchana was presented to the Prime Minister.
